attributes.action: CALL FOR A VOLUNTEER WEEK "CLEAN UP YOUR LOCAL HOSPITAL"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
AOL today reports that,

"NHS deep clean operation 'in danger of becoming expensive publicity stunt'

what about a programme that encourages people to help themselves ? Your administration may consider design of a leaflet - "protect yourself against hospital infections, including guidelines and a volunteer week . Of course you might also consider some of my other ideas, like paying your staff and protocols to make MRSA treatment more consistent.
